title: Ep. - 537 - SHAINA HURLEY FROM LOVE IS BLIND 2: AFTER THE ALTAR SISTER WIVES SEASON PREMIERE REVIEW
description:
Kate provides a rundown of the history of the couples on Sister Wives, a TLC show about a polygamist family. She reviews the season 17 premiere where Christine announced she is leaving Kody.

 

Shaina Hurley and her new husband Christos Lardakis talk about their engagement and wedding. Shaina also discusses how she was cast for the show, her relationship with Shane and Natalie, and more behind the scenes stories. Love is Blind 2: After the Altar tracks the couples this season after the weddings. Was love blind?  

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
